programme.title: French Open Today
programme.desc: Highlights from day six of the Grand Slam event at Roland Garros.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The seventh day's play at Roland Garros, where the third-round singles matches are scheduled to conclude in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Eventual champion Novak Djokovic ended the run of Great Britain's Aljaz Bedene at this stage last year with a dominant 6-2, 6-3, 6-3 victory. In the women's competition, top seed Serena Williams prevailed 6-4, 7-6 against Kristina Mladenovic, and her sister Venus was also victorious, beating Alize Cornet 7-6, 1-6, 6-0. Meanwhile, 200 champion Ana Ivanovic's run came to an end she was beaten 6-4, 6-4 by Elina Svitolina.(n)

programme.title: Live French Open Tennis
programme.desc: The eighth day's play at Roland Garros, where the fourth-round singles matches are scheduled to get under way in the second Grand Slam tournament of the year. Andy Murray continued his run to the final at this stage in 2016 with a 7-6. 6-4. 6-3 victory over John Isner, while 2015 champion Stan Wawrinka defeated Viktor Troicki 7-6, 6-7, 6-3, 6-3, and home favourite Richard Gasquet overcame fifth seed Kei Nishikori 6-4, 6-2, 4.6, 6-2. In the women's competition, eventual champion Garbine Muguruza prevailed 6-3, 6-4 against 2009 title-winner Svetlana Kuznetsova, and Shelby Rogers won by the same scoreline against Irina-Camelia Begu.(n)
